articles.title: China's wind giants hatch plans to muscle in on US, Europe - The Star Online
articles.description: CHINESE turbine makers have made their local wind power market the biggest in the world with a scorching pace of installations. Now, those giants want to take a larger slice of burgeoning global demand.
